experiences.title: Associate Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan
workDescription: Assist product teams in migrating on-premises applications to the cloud.
Develop and roll out cloud standards and integrations for secret retrieval, configuration management, messaging, all using helm charts.

Lead development and release of an asynchronous processing pattern using **KEDA** and **Dapr** to enable autoscaling and event-driven architecture. This allows for on demand microservices that **scale to 0** when not needed.

workDescription: Design and implement new processes and enhancements to optimize CI/CD pipelines & delivery infrastructure.
Aid in automating DB refresh process to involve **0 manual steps**, including scheduling refreshes aligned to release & sprint cadence.
